title: Self-Isolation Rules Ease as U.K. Faces 100000 Cases a Day
content:
1. Self-Isolation Rules Ease as U.K. Faces 100000 Cases a Day  Bloomberg
  2. Here's what could happen if the UK hits 100,000 daily COVID cases  Yahoo News Canada
  3. Covid-19 global updates: Britain's daily infections could reach 100000 this summer, health secretary says  The Washington Post
  4. The proposed relaxing of Covid restrictions in England has sparked a social media meltdown from ‘new abnormal’ enthusiasts  RT
  5. The return of Sajid Javid could be good news for insomniacs – if not our Covid-ravaged country  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 英国では1日に10万人の患者が発生しているため、自己隔離ルールが緩和される
